timeeatermod:TimeWardPower.NAME: Time Ward

timeeatermod:DrawVoidPower.NAME: Draw Void
DESCRIPTIONS: The next card you draw this turn will be a Void.
cards you draw this turn will be Voids.

timeeatermod:DesynchronizePower.NAME: Desynchronize
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time your Time Lock expires, you gain 1 Time Lock.

timeeatermod:ButterflyEffectPower.NAME: Butterfly Effect
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time an enemy's Time Lock expires, it affects ALL enemies.

timeeatermod:TakeDoubleDamagePower.NAME: Double Damage

timeeatermod:FleetingStrengthPower.NAME: Fleeting Strength
DESCRIPTIONS: Strength the next time you lose HP.

timeeatermod:FleetingDexterityPower.NAME: Fleeting Dexterity
DESCRIPTIONS: Dexterity the next time you lose HP.

timeeatermod:MetronomePower.NAME: Metronome
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, you can choose to enter either timeeatermod:Forward or timeeatermod:Rewind_Tempo.
